projects.name: AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description: Built an AI-powered resume builder with Firebase authentication, enabling users to create, update, and generate professional resumes from stored profile data. Integrated Firestore for real-time data storage and Streamlit for interactive frontend.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.description:
Developed multi-agent AI systems and backend services for a financial analytics platform using FastAPI, LangChain, and LLMs.
Contributed to automation, intelligent reporting, and research tools for enhanced decision-making.

personal_info.summary: Experienced software developer with 5+ years in full-stack development...
